name: Developer Roadmap Learning System
description: Ultra-comprehensive learning system for 65+ developer roles with specialized agents, interactive roadmaps, hands-on skills, and guided learning paths based on roadmap.sh.
author: Claude Code

agents.name: frontend-web-agent
agents.description: Master web technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue, Angular, web performance, testing, and UI/UX design. Covers 15+ frontend-related roles.

agents.name: backend-server-agent
agents.description: Complete backend mastery: Python, Node.js, Java, Go, Rust, PHP, databases, APIs, microservices. Covers 18+ server-side programming roles.

agents.name: cloud-devops-agent
agents.description: Cloud expertise: AWS, Azure, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD, monitoring. Covers 12+ cloud and infrastructure roles.

agents.name: data-ai-agent
agents.description: Data science and AI: ML engineering, data engineering, AI systems, deep learning, LLMs, prompt engineering. Covers 12+ data and AI roles.

agents.name: architecture-design-agent
agents.description: System architecture mastery: API design, design patterns, system design, code quality, UX design, design systems. Covers 10+ architecture roles.

agents.name: languages-fundamentals-agent
agents.description: Programming languages and fundamentals: Python, JavaScript, Java, Go, Rust, C++, data structures, algorithms, git. Covers 25+ language roles.

agents.name: specialized-roles-agent
agents.description: Unique career paths: product management, DevRel, technical writing, mobile development (iOS/Android), game development. Covers 15+ specialized roles.

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Choose a developer role and begin your personalized learning path with guided roadmap

commands.name: browse
commands.description: Explore all 65+ developer roles across 7 specialization areas

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Evaluate your current knowledge level and get personalized learning recommendations

commands.name: roadmap
commands.description: Get detailed learning path, timeline, resources, and projects for any role

commands.name: projects
commands.description: Access 500+ hands-on projects from beginner to expert level

skills.name: frontend-web
skills.description: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Vue, Angular, web performance, accessibility, testing, UI frameworks

skills.name: backend-server
skills.description: Python, Node.js, Java, Go, Rust, PHP, databases, APIs, microservices, authentication, caching

skills.name: cloud-devops
skills.description: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, logging, container orchestration

skills.name: data-ai-ml
skills.description: Data pipelines, machine learning, deep learning, NLP, computer vision, LLMs, prompt engineering

skills.name: architecture-design
skills.description: System design, API design, design patterns, scalability, performance optimization, code quality

skills.name: languages-fundamentals
skills.description: Programming languages, data structures, algorithms, computer science theory, version control

skills.name: specialized-careers
